players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice was killed, so the mafia is clearly among us. We need to look at voting patterns and who seems most suspicious today."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "We must vote for Bob. I am the detective and confirmed he is mafia. He killed Alice."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He's the mafioso, not me. Vote Charlie!"
